TunableTuple.name: AcidRainColor
TunableTuple.description: Multiply with current rain color.

Tunable.name: AmbienceHeightSpread
Tunable.description: Controls the gradient of ambient light according to height within a room. The ambient light effect scales from this value to full (1) at the ceiling.

Tunable.name: AmbienceMaximum
Tunable.description: Sets the maximum amount of ambient light, as a brightness value.

Tunable.name: AmbienceMinimum
Tunable.description: Sets the minimum amount of ambient light as a fraction of the 'brady bunch blue' color.

Tunable.name: AmbientScale
Tunable.description: Scales the contribution of lights to the ambient light applied to parts of the room not directly affected by any light.

TunableTuple.name: BradyBunchBlue
TunableTuple.description: Sets the 'brady bunch blue' color used in dark interior areas.

Tunable.name: EnableLightRigBBBOnLightMaps
Tunable.description: Enables the BBB rig used in darkness on walls/floors. (It is always enabled on objects.)

Tunable.name: ExteriorDropShadowDimming
Tunable.description: Sets the fraction of shadow darkening removed from exterior drop shadows.

TunableList.name: LightingSolverLODs
TunableList.description: Inactive and active lot tuning settings for the lighting solver, which computes room lighting and lot lightmaps.

Tunable.name: LightMapSubdivision
Tunable.description: Number of texels per meter in the lot lightmaps, where 1 = 1m resolution. Use bigger numbers for higher resolution lightmaps, lower numbers for speed. Valid range: 1-16.

Tunable.name: LightIntensityScale
Tunable.description: Global scaling factor on all light intensity values. 1.0 applies intensities as-is.

Tunable.name: LightInteriorCounterDirectionScale
Tunable.display: Light rig: Interior auto counter light strength
Tunable.description: Amount of counter lighting applied to the back side object to prevent the light-opposed side from being too dark.

Tunable.name: LightRigBBBAmbientDimming
Tunable.display: BBB rig: Dark light ambient dimming
Tunable.description: Dims ambient when the BBB light rig is ramped up.

TunableTuple.name: LightRigBBBObjectLight1
TunableTuple.description: First directional light of object light rig used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Color
TunableTuple.description: Sets the 'brady bunch blue' color used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Direction
TunableTuple.description: Yaw and pitch for light direction.

Tunable.name: Intensity
Tunable.description: Light intensity (scaling factor on color).

TunableTuple.name: LightRigBBBObjectLight2
TunableTuple.description: Second directional light of object light rig used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Color
TunableTuple.description: Sets the 'brady bunch blue' color used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Direction
TunableTuple.description: Yaw and pitch for light direction.

Tunable.name: Intensity
Tunable.description: Light intensity (scaling factor on color).

TunableTuple.name: LightRigBBBObjectLight3
TunableTuple.description: Third directional light of object light rig used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Color
TunableTuple.description: Sets the 'brady bunch blue' color used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Direction
TunableTuple.description: Yaw and pitch for light direction.

Tunable.name: Intensity
Tunable.description: Light intensity (scaling factor on color).

Tunable.name: LightRigBBBThreshold
Tunable.description: Controls the lower brightness limit below which an object is considered to be in darkness and 'brady bunch blue' is added.

TunableTuple.name: LightRigBBBWallFloorLight1
TunableTuple.description: First directional light of wall/floor light rig used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Color
TunableTuple.description: Sets the 'brady bunch blue' color used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Direction
TunableTuple.description: Yaw and pitch for light direction.

Tunable.name: Intensity
Tunable.description: Light intensity (scaling factor on color).

TunableTuple.name: LightRigBBBWallFloorLight2
TunableTuple.description: Second directional light of wall/floor light rig used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Color
TunableTuple.description: Sets the 'brady bunch blue' color used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Direction
TunableTuple.description: Yaw and pitch for light direction.

Tunable.name: Intensity
Tunable.description: Light intensity (scaling factor on color).

TunableTuple.name: LightRigBBBWallFloorLight3
TunableTuple.description: Third directional light of wall/floor light rig used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Color
TunableTuple.description: Sets the 'brady bunch blue' color used for darkness.

TunableTuple.name: Direction
TunableTuple.description: Yaw and pitch for light direction.

Tunable.name: Intensity
Tunable.description: Light intensity (scaling factor on color).

Tunable.name: LightRigMaximum
Tunable.description: Limits the brightness of all lights in an object's light rig to prevent an object from blowing out.

Tunable.name: LightRigMinspecAmbientFactor
Tunable.description: Scales the contribution of lights to the ambient term. Higher values are uniformly brighter.

Tunable.name: LightRigMinspecAmbientLimit
Tunable.description: Limits the ambient component, on a scale of 0-1.

Tunable.name: LightRigMinspecBaseAmbient
Tunable.description: Amount of base ambient to add, on top of the computed interior ambient and light colors.

Tunable.name: LightRigMinspecDirectionalFactor
Tunable.description: Scales the contribution of lights to the signed directional term. Higher values intensify the lighting on the front side and darken it on the back side.

Tunable.name: LightRigMinspecDirectionalLimit
Tunable.description: Limits the signed directional component, on a scale of 0-1.

Tunable.name: LightRigMinspecMaxDirectionalToAmbientRatio
Tunable.description: Limits the directional color magnitude to a multiple of the ambient magnitude. Higher values allow more darkening of the back side of the object.

Tunable.name: LightRigScale
Tunable.description: Scales the brightness of all light contributions on an object. This is applied before the maximum brightness limit.

Tunable.name: MaximumLightmapTexelIntensity
Tunable.description: Sets a hard limit on the brightness of the lightmap, without renormalization (local effect only, without brightening or darkening the whole room).

Tunable.name: MaximumRoomBrightestPoint
Tunable.description: Sets an upper bound on brightness within a room, above which lights are reduced in intensity.

Tunable.name: MinimumRoomBrightestPoint
Tunable.description: Sets a lower bound on brightness within a room, below which lights are increased in intensity.

Tunable.name: NearbyLightDimming
Tunable.display: General: Nearby Lamp Light Dimming Fraction
Tunable.description: The fraction by which a light is dimmed by incident lamp luminance. The Formula is 1/(1 + factor * Dot(IncidentLight, kLuma)

Tunable.name: NearbyWindowDimming
Tunable.display: General: Nearby Window Light Dimming Fraction
Tunable.description: The fraction by which a light is dimmed by incident window luminance. The Formula is 1/(1 + factor * Dot(IncidentLight, kLuma)

TunableTuple.name: OpaqueWindowColor
TunableTuple.description: Sets the opaque window/door light color.

Tunable.name: RugLightmapDimming
Tunable.description: Sets the fraction of lightmap light received by a rug.

Tunable.name: SunlightScale
Tunable.description: Scales the directional light component of the sun.

Tunable.name: VertexColorScale
Tunable.display: Light rig: Lamp vertex self-illum. scale
Tunable.description: Scales the amount of self-illumination applied to turned-on lamps through the per-vertex lamp mask in the model.

Tunable.name: WindowAreaConversionFactor
Tunable.description: Scales how much window area affects light from the sky. This is the same as applying a scale to both sunny and far side diffuse brightness.

Tunable.name: WindowDarkSideScale
Tunable.description: Scales the light from the sky coming through the windows facing away from the sun during the day.

Tunable.name: WindowDesaturateSkyColor
Tunable.description: Controls saturation of sky color applied through window light.

Tunable.name: WindowSillShadowDistance
Tunable.description: Distance at which sky and spill light from a window is attenuated to simulate shadowing from the window sill.

Tunable.name: WindowSpillMultiplier
Tunable.description: Controls the amount of light emitted out of a window from a lit room at night time.

Tunable.name: WindowSunBrightness
Tunable.description: Scales the light from the sun coming through the window during the day.

Tunable.name: WindowSunHeading
Tunable.description: Heading of fixed sun direction for sunlight coming through a window.

Tunable.name: WindowSunPitch
Tunable.description: Pitch of fixed sun direction for sunlight coming through a window.

Tunable.name: WindowSunSideScale
Tunable.description: Scales the light from the sky coming through the windows facing toward the sun during the day.
